achievements.title: Data Processing Optimization at NREL
achievements.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing.

achievements.title: System Scalability Improvement
achievements.description: Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance.

achievements.title: CI/CD Workflow Restructuring
achievements.description: Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions.

achievements.title: Data Export/Import Implementation
achievements.description: Improved database efficiency and data lifecycle management by implementing data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore.

achievements.title: OFSAA LLFP Implementation
achievements.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for two international financial banking firms.

achievements.title: ETL Pipeline Development
achievements.description: Engineered six GUI-based workflow runs for ETL pipelines, integrating them with backend scripts to process data from pre-staging to end-user report generation stage.

achievements.title: UI Enhancement for IA Module
achievements.description: Enhanced UI for the Individual Assessment module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing four UI forms and eight PL/SQL scripts to process over 300,000 customer records.

achievements.title: PL/SQL Automation
achievements.description: Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation, automating manual tasks for filtering source data, reducing execution times by 20 percent when generating end-user reports.

achievements.title: AI Camp Generative AI Hackathon Winner
achievements.description: Won the AWS for Startups prize for creating a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks on behalf of users.
reference_context: AICamp Generative AI Hackathon for AI Agent and RAG

achievements.title: Embedded Server Sensor Development
achievements.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures and optimized the system for real-time data handling.

achievements.title: Rough Set Theory Modeling
achievements.description: Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python, achieving 95% accuracy processing 65,536 objects in two minutes.
